title: Workshop on Teaching Methods Using Adaptive Learning Technology in Special Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational special education theories and understanding of general pedagogical methodologies
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing effective application of adaptive learning technologies (VR, gamification, AI) in special education settings for pre-service and in-service teachers. Focuses on enhancing actual lesson design skills through hands-on practice with personal devices and formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three criteria for selecting adaptive technologies (VR/gamification/AI) considering cognitive load levels of special education students
Learners can design gamified language education scenarios tailored to learner characteristics (age, academic achievement, gender)
Learners can analyze at least two cognitive barriers and propose improvements when using AI-based educational tools in BYOD environments

resources: AI Learning Analytics Tool Sample Data
Special Education Learner Case Study Collection

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
